## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass: `uv run pytest tests/ -v`
- [ ] Lint passes: `uv run ruff check src/ tests/`
- [ ] Types pass: `uv run basedpyright src/`
- [ ] New code has tests
- [ ] Documentation updated (if user-facing change)
- [ ] CLAUDE.md updated (if architecture changed)
